main event: Multiple persons reported seeing an object in the sky over Lovingston, Virginia on February 13, 1952.
interesting points: The object was sighted by several witnesses across the city at approximately the same time., The sighting lasted for about 5 seconds., Aircraft in the area reported a motor at approximately the same time as the sighting., A military report evaluated the incident and established that it was likely a meteorite in transit., Visual observations included both ground and aerial perspectives.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object, likely a meteorite
